summary.para: Fires after the user has copied data displayed in a DevExpress control to the clipboard.
Fires when the user attempts to copy data displayed in a DevExpress control to the clipboard and allows you to allow (or cancel) the operation.
Allows you to respond to associated failures.
Contains data for the event.

summary.para: Returns a string representation of the current object.

member.returns: A string representation of the current object.

summary.para: Fires after the user has pasted data into a DevExpress control from the clipboard.
Fires when the user attempts to paste data into a DevExpress control from the clipboard and allows you to allow (or cancel) the operation.
Applies a policy to suppress all clipboard-related operations within DevExpress WinForms and WPF controls (including operations performed by DevExpress WinForms and WPF controls).
Applies a policy to suppress clipboard clearing operations performed by DevExpress WinForms and WPF controls.
Applies a policy to suppress clipboard-access operations performed by DevExpress WinForms and WPF controls.
Applies a policy to suppress all copy-to-clipboard operations within DevExpress WinForms and WPF controls.
Applies a policy to suppress all paste-from-clipboard operations within DevExpress WinForms and WPF controls.
Applies a policy that suppresses all clipboard-related operations in DevExpress WinForms and WPF controls.
Applies a policy that throws an exception when a clipboard-related operation fails in a DevExpress WinForms or WPF control.
Allows you to control processes initiated by DevExpress UI controls in response to user actions.

summary.para: Contains common utility classes used by WPF controls and components from DevExpress.
An abstract class that provides access to an application’s theme settings.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.ApplicationThemeHelper.UseDefaultSvgImages

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to display vector or bitmap icons within WPF controls.

member.value: true to display vector icons; false to display bitmap icons.

summary.para: Specifies whether the application should use the legacy default theme (“DeepBlue”).
Lists the values that specify the compatibility settings version.
The DevExpress WPF controls function like in the latest version.
The DevExpress WPF controls function like in v17.2.

Provides access to compatibility settings.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.AllowAccessibilityAlerts

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to enable UI Automation-based accessibility alerts for validation errors.

member.value: true to enable UI Automation-based accessibility alerts for validation errors; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.AllowEditTextExpressionInFormatRule

summary.para: Gets or sets whether users can edit a format condition’s expression text.

member.value: true to allow users to edit a format condition’s expression text; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.AllowEditValueBindingInInplaceEditors

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the GridControl’s logic of getting/setting the editor’s value is enabled.

member.value: true, if the GridControl’s logic of getting/setting the editor’s value is enabled; otherwise, false.The default value is true.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.AllowGlyphRunRenderingInInplaceEditors

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to use the GlyphRun engine to render text in cell editors.

member.value: true to use the GlyphRun engine; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.AllowLookupGridFiltering

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to allow users to filter grid values in the Drop-down Filter and Filter Editor when the is in the .

member.value: true to allow users to filter grid values in the Drop-down Filter and Filter Editor when the is in the ; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.AllowRecyclingRibbonItems

summary.para: Gets or sets whether ribbon controls should attempt to re-use existing link control (LightweightBarItemLinkControl, BarButtonItemLinkControl, BarCheckItemLinkControl, and so on) objects to enhance merging performance.

member.value: true, to re-use an existing link control; otherwise false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.AllowThemePreload

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to enable the legacy Theme Preload.

member.value: true to enable the legacy Theme Preload; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.AlwaysUseLegacyColumnChooser

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to display the Column Chooser in the legacy window.

member.value: true to display the Column Chooser in the legacy window; false to use this legacy window only if the is in a pop-up window.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.AlwaysUseLegacySummaryEditor

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to display the Runtime Summary Editor in the legacy window.

member.value: true to display the Runtime Summary Editor in the legacy window; false to use this legacy window only if the is in a pop-up window.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.CompatibilityMode

summary.para: Gets or sets the controls’ compatibility mode.

member.value: A compatibility mode.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.ConvertOccurrenceToNormalWhenDragBetweenResources

summary.para: Specifies whether a recurring appointment is converted to a normal appointment when an end-user drags and drops it to another resource.

member.value: True, if a recurring appointment is converted to normal after a drag-and-drop operation to another resource; otherwise, false. Default is false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.DXBindingResolvingMode

summary.para: Gets or sets a value that specifies how the DXBinding (DXEvent, DXCommand) markup extensions resolve input expressions.

member.value: Any of the enumeration values.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.EnableDPICorrection

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to enable DPI correction to improve layout rendering.

member.value: true, to enable DPI correction; otherwise false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.HideCalendarButtonInDateNavigationPanel

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to hide the Calendar Button from the Date Navigation Panel.

member.value: true to hide the Calendar Button from the Date Navigation Panel; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.HideInsignificantPartsOnlyInTimeSpanMask

summary.para: Gets or sets whether TimeSpan masks should hide optional segments.

member.value: false to hide optional segments in TimeSpan masks; otherwise true.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.LegacyDefaultTheme

summary.para: Specifies a legacy default theme which the application should use.

member.value: A legacy default theme.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.MakeGetWindowReturnActualFloatPanelWindow

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the Window.GetWindow() method should return the floating window’s position in relation to the main window’s position (where the DockLayoutManager manager is placed).

member.value: true to return a floating window’s related prosition; otherwise false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.MaskUpdateSelectionOnMouseUp

summary.para: Gets or sets whether editors should automatically update their selection to highlight a selected mask part that a user can edit.

member.value: true, to update editor selection to highlight a selected mask part that a user can edit; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.PivotGridDisableBatchUpdate

summary.para: Specifies whether to update the in a single batch during the data source synchronization.

member.value: true, to restore the legacy (slower) behavior; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.PrioritizeIListSourceInDiagramDataBinding

summary.para: Specifies whether the DiagramControl’s data binding engine prioritizes the IListSource interface over the IEnumerable.

member.value: true, to prioritize the IListSource interface; false, to prioritize the IEnumerable interface.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.RenderPDFPageContentWithDirectX

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to render page content with DirectX.

member.value: true, to enable DirectX page content rendering; false, to render page content with GDI/GDI+. The default is true.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.SchedulerAppearanceStyle

summary.para: Gets or sets the SchedulerControl UI style.

member.value: By default, Outlook2019.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.ShowSchedulerDateNavigationPanel

summary.para: Specifies whether to display the Date Navigation Panel by default.

member.value: true, to display the WPF Scheduler’s Date Navigation Panel by default, otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.TrackBarEditIsMoveToPointEnabled

summary.para: Gets or sets whether TrackBarEdit should increment or decrement its value when a user clicked a line next to the thumb.

member.value: true to increment or decrement TrackBarEdit value when a user clicks a line next to the thumb; otherwise false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.UseDateNavigatorInDateEdit

summary.para: Specifies whether to use the control to render the ‘s dropdown window.

member.value: true to use the DateNavigator in the DateEdit‘s dropdown; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.UseFriendlyDateRangePresentation

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the Between Dates and On Dates date operators are used.

member.value: true, to use the Between Dates and On Dates date operators; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.UseLegacyCalendarInDateNavigator

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the legacy calendar is used in the .

member.value: true, to use the legacy calendar; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.UseLegacyColumnFilterPopup

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the legacy drop-down filter is used.

member.value: true, to use the legacy drop-down filter; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.UseLegacyDeleteButtonInButtonEdit

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to use the legacy Null Value button in the ButtonEdit editor and its descendants.

member.value: true, to use the legacy Null Value button; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.UseLegacyDXMessageBox

summary.para: Gets or sets whether DevExpress WPF Controls display their messages in the legacy message box.

member.value: true if DevExpress WPF Controls display their messages in the legacy message box; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.UseLegacyFilterEditor

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the legacy filter editor is used.

member.value: true, to use the legacy filter editor; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.UseLegacyFilterPanel

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to use the legacy filter panel.

member.value: true, to use the legacy filter panel; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.UseLegacyQueryIntervalCalculation

summary.para: Specifies whether to calculate and individually for each ‘s occurrence.

member.value: true, to calculate QueryStart and QueryEnd individually for each occurrence; false, to use the pattern’s QueryStart and QueryEnd for changed and deleted occurrences.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.UseLegacySchedulerCellDecoration

summary.para: Specifies whether to use decoration panels to draw the ‘s elements.

member.value: true to use the legacy mechanism affected by the CellControl’s customization properties; false to use decoration panels.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.UseLegacySchedulerTimelineViewMode

summary.para: Specifies whether to revert to the legacy Timeline view.

member.value: true, to revert to the legacy Timeline view; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.UseLegacyWindowForRibbonCustomization

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to display the Ribbon Customization Options in the legacy window.

member.value: true to display the Ribbon Customization Options in the legacy window; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.UseLightweightBarItems

summary.para: Gets or sets whether optimized mode should be enabled for all items. This property should be set at the application’s startup before loading bar components.

member.value: true to enable optimized mode for all items; otherwise false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.UseLightweightTemplatesInStandardButtons

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the dx:ButtonThemeKey resource containing the Button template should use the ResourceKey=ButtonControlTemplate.

member.value: true, to use ResourceKey=ButtonControlTemplate in the dx:ButtonThemeKey resource; otherwise false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.UseLightweightThemes

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to use lightweight themes within the application.

member.value: true to use lightweight themes within the application; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.UseMiddleMouseScrolling

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to enable the middle-click to scroll functionality.

member.value: true to enable the middle-click to scroll functionality; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.UseRibbonDeferredPageMerging

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to enable a ribbon’s deferred page merging.

member.value: true to merge ribbon’s page content only when a user opens the page; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.UseThemedMessageBoxInServices

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to use the ThemedMessageBox instead of DXMessageBox in WindowService, DialogService, and WindowedDocumentUIService.

member.value: true, to use the ThemedMessageBox; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.UseThemedWaitIndicatorInSplashScreen

summary.para: Specifies whether to revert to the Wait Indicator control that uses the theme resources.

member.value: true, to revert to the Wait Indicator control that uses the theme resources; otherwise, false. The default value is false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.UseThemedWindowInServices

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to use the instead of in WindowService, DialogService, and WindowedDocumentUIService.

member.value: true, to use the ; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Xpf.Core.CompatibilitySettings.ValueAfterDeleteInNumericMask

summary.para: Specifies whether editors set the 0 (zero) or null value after the last digit is removed.

member.value: A mode that specifies whether editors set the 0 (zero) or null value after the last digit is removed.

summary.para: Lists values that specify how the DXBinding (DXEvent, DXCommand) markup extensions resolve input expressions.
The DXBinding, DXCommand and DXEvent markup extensions interpret their expressions that allows them using dynamic typization, so you do no need to cast values.
The DXBinding, DXCommand and DXEvent markup extensions compile their expressions thus using static typization, so you do need to cast values.
Lists legacy default themes.
The DeepBlue legacy default theme. The theme was default in the v16.1 WPF Controls and prior.
The Office2016White legacy default theme. The theme was default in the v20.1 WPF Controls and prior.
Lists values that correspond to DevExpress WPF controls.
The Accordion Control
All controls from the DevExpress.Xpf.Controls assembly

Lists the values that specify the NumericMaskOptions.ValueAfterDelete property.
When a user removes the last digit, the editor value becomes null.
When a user removes the last digit, the editor value becomes 0 (zero). If a user presses the Backspace or Delete key to remove this zero, the editor value becomes null.
